creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
The download page

http://ant.apache.org/antlibs/bindownload.cgi

says "archive including Apache Commons Compress 1.4 and XZ for Java 1.0:"

This does not seem correct, as Commons Compress 1.4 requires Java 5 (1.5).
1.0 is the version of "XZ for Java", not of "Java".  I've changed the sentence and hope it is clearer now.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text: Yes, that disambiguates it for me!
